name: fetchline
description: Read text file (remote over HTTP(S) or local) line by line as async iterator, with Node, browsers and Deno

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:types
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && tsc -p config/tsconfig.cjs.json && rimraf dist/cjs/index.d.ts
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && tsc -p config/tsconfig.esm.json && rimraf dist/esm/index.d.ts
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist/umd && webpack --config config/webpack.config.js && rimraf src/index.d.ts

author: Tom Chen <tomchen.org@gmail.com>
